mentors.name: Dhiraj Mohon
mentors.bio: Former Harvard admissions committee member with 15+ years of experience guiding students through the college application process. I specialize in crafting compelling personal statements and research CVs that stand out.
mentors.fullBio:
With over 15 years on the Harvard admissions committee, I've reviewed thousands of applications and know exactly what top universities look for. My approach focuses on authentic storytelling and highlighting your unique strengths. I've helped over 300 students gain admission to Ivy League schools.

My expertise includes:
• Personal statement development from brainstorming to final draft
• Research CV optimization for STEM applicants
• Mock interviews with detailed feedback
• Application strategy and university selection

I believe every student has a unique story worth telling, and I'm here to help you tell yours.

mentors.name: Shatabdi Roy
mentors.bio: Stanford alumnus and former tech startup founder. I help students craft narratives that showcase leadership, innovation, and passion for their chosen fields.
mentors.fullBio:
As a Stanford graduate (Class of 2010) and successful entrepreneur, I bring a unique perspective to college admissions. I've been on both sides - as an applicant and as someone who interviews candidates.

What I offer:
• Strategic application planning for maximum impact
• Interview coaching with real-world scenarios
• Essay editing that maintains your authentic voice
• Insights into what Stanford and top tech schools value

I've mentored 80+ students, with a 92% acceptance rate to their top-choice schools. My approach is practical, honest, and focused on bringing out your best self.

mentors.name: Mst. Israt Jahan
mentors.bio: Princeton graduate with expertise in humanities applications. I've coached students in crafting essays that capture attention and secure admissions to top-tier universities.
mentors.fullBio:
As an English Literature graduate from Princeton, I understand the power of words. I've spent the last 8 years helping students transform their college essays from good to exceptional.

My services include:
• Comprehensive essay editing and feedback
• Guidance on recommendation letter strategy
• Personal statement workshops
• Humanities-focused application consulting

I work with students to find their authentic voice and tell stories that resonate with admissions officers. My students have been accepted to Princeton, Yale, Columbia, and other top institutions with over 85% success rate.
